meanings.sent1: The antishark net kept the swimmers safe from any nearby sharks.
meanings.sent2: The antishark behavior of the dolphins scared away the approaching shark.
meanings.sent3: The antishark spray made the shark swim in the opposite direction, confused.
meanings.sent4: Her fierce glare was like an antishark shield, warding off any unwanted attention.
meanings.sent5: The antishark alarm blared, warning everyone to stay out of the water.

meanings.definition: Designed to protect against or repel sharks.
meanings.sent1: The antishark wetsuit had special colors that sharks dislike.
meanings.sent2: The boat had an antishark cage for divers to stay safe during their expedition.
meanings.sent3: The antishark device emitted a sound that made sharks swim away quickly.
meanings.sent4: The antishark barrier surrounded the beach, ensuring no sharks could approach.
meanings.sent5: The antishark technology used vibrations to deter sharks from coming closer.
